Instruction: Pit and chop the plums into small pieces.
In a saucepan, bring the chicken or vegetable broth to a boil.
Stir in couscous, cover, and remove from heat. Let it sit for 5 minutes.
Fluff the couscous with a fork, then transfer it to a large mixing bowl.
Add chopped plums and chopped mint leaves to the bowl with couscous.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Pour the dressing over the couscous mixture and toss gently to combine.
Serve the plum and mint couscous warm or at room temperature as a flavorful side dish.
